title: Maskiss 25-Pairs 24K Gold Under Eye Patches/Masks for Puffy Eyes, Dark Circles and Puffiness, Collagen Skin Care Products
descriptions:
Maskiss 25-Pairs 24K Gold Under Eye Patches/Masks

Revive tired eyes with Maskiss 24K Gold Under Eye Patches—an indulgent, effective treatment designed to hydrate, de-puff, and brighten the delicate under-eye area. Each box includes 25 pairs of hydrogel patches infused with Collagen, 24K Nano Gold, and Hyaluronic Acid to deliver visible results and a spa-like experience at home.

Key benefits:
- Anti-aging support: Helps smooth fine lines and supports collagen rejuvenation and elasticity.
- De-puffs and soothes: Reduces under-eye bags and morning puffiness for a refreshed look.
- Brightens dark circles: Targets discoloration for a more awake, illuminated appearance.
- Deep hydration and moisture: Hyaluronic Acid plumps and hydrates to improve skin texture.
- Protective, rejuvenating care: 24K Nano Gold and natural plant extracts help protect and revitalize.

What’s inside:
- 25 pairs (50 patches) of hydrogel under-eye masks.
- Form: Patches designed specifically for the under-eye area.
- Suitable for: All skin types.
- Gentle formula: Natural plant extracts; free from known side effects.

How to use:
- Cleanse your face and eye area with warm water.
- Apply one patch under each eye and press gently for a secure fit.
- Leave on for 20 minutes.
- Remove and lightly pat any remaining essence until absorbed.
- Use twice a day for intensive care or at least once a week for maintenance.

Hero ingredients:
- Collagen: Supports firmness and smooths the appearance of fine lines.
- 24K Nano Gold: Known for its protective and rejuvenating properties.
- Hyaluronic Acid: Draws in moisture for plumper, well-hydrated skin.

Why you’ll love it:
- Fast, fuss-free treatment with visible results.
- Cooling hydrogel feel that comforts delicate skin.
- Perfect before makeup, after long days, or anytime your eyes need a refresh.

Give your under-eyes the gold-standard glow with Maskiss 24K Gold Under Eye Patches/Masks, and reveal brighter, smoother, more youthful-looking skin.
